member.name: T:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController
member.summary: Controller for handling clock related actions.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.Available
member.summary: Gets a list with currently available clocks.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.Users(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets current clock users for a clock.
member.param: The clock name to get users from.
The clocks user- or administratior password.
member.returns: Array of strings with user name, IP-address and last time cloclk was accessed.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.Time(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets current time and status for a clock.
member.param: The clock name to get time and status from.
The name or station name of the user that makes the request.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.Settings(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets current settings for a clock.
member.param: The clock name to get settings from.
The administrator password is required to get the clock settings.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.Start(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts or restarts game time. Only the user that stopped the clock or the administrator can restart the clock.
member.param: The name or station name of the user that tries to start the clock.
A clock user or clock administrator password.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.Stop(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Starts or restarts game time. Only user with a name and given reason or the administrator can stop the clock.
member.param: The name or station name of the user that want to stop the clock for a given reason.
A clock user or clock administrator password.

member.name: M:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ClockController.ClockUser(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the current user of the clock.
member.param: The user password to the clock.
The name or station name to set as user name.

members.member:
Create a new clock the of a clock.
The name or station name of the user that want to update the clock settings. . Returns no data.

member.name: T:Tellurian.Trains.MeetingApp.Server.Controllers.ContentController
member.summary: Endpoint for getting language specific texts.
